string-array.name: computer_room_descriptions
string-array.item: These computers are located in the center of the first floor by the grand staircase.
These computers are located outside the Mini Lab (Room 118). They are available 24 hours a day.
These computers are located outside Room 162, across from the print release stations. These are on standing-height desks are meant for quick print jobs.
These computers are located in the Media Lab (Room 117).
These computers are located in room 162. Please check the room schedule as it is often reserved for classes.
These computers are located on the second floor near the group study rooms, ID&D, and the Faculty Lounge.
These computers are located on the second floor outside the Writing Center and the CSA.
This computer lab is located on the second floor in room 262.
These computers are located on the third floor by the Grand Staircase and the seminar rooms.
